Our Process

All Deale projects follow a tried and tested creative process to ensure happiness on both ends, and to ensure our clients get exactly what they want.

1

Discuss The Project

We will begin with an initial meeting where a general discussion of the project will take place - what does the client need and for what purpose?

2

Brainstorming & Concept

We will then discuss various ideas for the project - How does the client want the app/site to feel? what kind of functionality is required?

3

Site/App Planning

We will then begin to plan out the site/app, mockups/wireframes will be created and a final plan will be decided upon.

4

Interaction

We promise to always keep you in the loop during the course of your project - Regular progress reports with clients and changing of features and look/feel if necessary.
